sentences: Mees polnud oma ümbruskonnas, kõrgemal pool kuigi heas kirjas.
Tegelikult oli ta heas kirjas kogu linnas.
Ta oli heas kirjas nii tööl kui ka naabrite seas.
context: The Estonian word 'heas' is part of the phrase 'heas kirjas,' which means to be in good standing, well-regarded, or held in high esteem by others. It describes someone who has a positive reputation and is respected within their community or professional environment.
